name: LIFE SAVING SOCIETY OF INDIA
briefDescription: Life Saving Society of India is a national body dedicated to Save Lives from land or water.Nationally the Society is into training & certification of Life Savers, Life Guards, Disaster Management, various watercraft training, rescue diving, search & rescue from various scenarios, adventure tourism handling, water sports training and also various training in various vocational trades which may support a human Life.Under our various departments of work, we do various projects and programmes in Wild Life and Conservation of Eco-systems, Environmental Studies and its protection, Women Empowerment and Child Welfare.We in LSSI believe, all life forms on Earth are important and require protection.
